  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0jadeyQIItIuRgeH]{噬星爆发 Eclipse Burst}

仪式

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.c3b6LdLlQDPngNIb]{唤起死灵 Create Undead}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2CNqkt2s2IYkVnv6]{禁锢术 Imprisonment}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.2ykmAVKrsAWcazcC]{异界誓缚 Planar Binding}

Atrophied Lich.name: 衰败巫妖 Atrophied Lich
Atrophied Lich.description:
有时候，一个巫妖在很长一段时间内保持静止和无知觉——就如同沃达凯在一万年前的星陨之灾时被囚禁在他的坟墓后所做的那样——会导致其衰败。衰败的确切效果因巫妖而异，但是总会导致施法能力的降低和对他们命匣链接的损害。

在沃达凯的例子中，他已经遗忘了许多奥法学识，并且失去了大量的施法能力。在他最强大的时候，他是一名20级法师，但在如今，他的力量已经下降到一名12级法师。更让这名巫妖所烦恼的是，他无法使用命匣来复苏——如果沃达凯被摧毁，他将化作尘土并且永远的死去。假以时日，沃达凯可以恢复他的力量，并且重获复苏的能力。只是PC们不太可能给他这个机会，毕竟巫妖需要花上数年的时间来消除以世纪为单位的时光所带来的侵蚀。

Counterspell.name: 反制法术 Counterspell
Counterspell.description:
触发 一个生物施放了一个沃达凯已准备的法术。

效果 沃达凯消耗一个已准备的法术位来反制这个目标生物所施放的相同的法术。他如同施放了该法术那般失去法术位。然后，他尝试反制所触发的法术。

Flash of Insight.name: 瞬时洞见 Flash of Insight
Flash of Insight.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 沃达凯将要投掷一次d20；

效果 沃达凯凝视着一个可能未来的蔽塞余象。他获得成功（但不是大成功）而无需投骰。

Steady Spellcasting.name: 稳定施法 Steady Spellcasting
Steady Spellcasting.description: 如果一个反应动作会打断沃达凯的施法动作，该巫妖尝试一次@Check[type:flat|dc:15]检定。成功时，他的动作不被打断。

Consume Memories.name: 吞噬记忆 Consume Memories
Consume Memories.description:
沃达凯取出了一个生物的记忆并且将其吞噬，通过受害者的思想来了解这个世界的点点滴滴。巫妖对目标进行一次手触打击；如果命中，他造成@Damage[6d6[void]]伤害。目标必须尝试一次@Check[type:will|dc:32]豁免，之后将在24小时内暂时免疫吞噬记忆。

大成功 该生物不受额外效果的影响。

成功 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}，持续1轮。

失败 该生物呆滞1，持续时间无限。作为吞噬记忆的结果，沃达凯于1分钟内在所有的技能检定中获得+1状态加值。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.0jAT2TJoqC1z6NCf]{效果: 吞噬记忆}

大失败 如同失败，但是目标会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}，持续时间无限。此外，取决于GM的判断，沃达凯可以通过心灵感应得知受害者所知晓的一个特定的秘密。

Drain Oculus.name: 汲取魔眼 Drain Oculus
Drain Oculus.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 沃达凯挖掘末日之眼的力量来施放任意最高为6环的奥术魔法，无论该魔法是否是他的准备法术之一。

Familiar.name: 魔宠 Familiar
Familiar.description: 沃达凯的魔宠是霍拉格纳蒙

Paralyzing Touch.name: 麻痹之触 Paralyzing Touch
Paralyzing Touch.description:
被沃达凯手触打击所伤害的生物必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:32]豁免。

失败则会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}，持续1轮。大失败时，该生物会被永久麻痹，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}且看起来与死了无异。通过@Check[type:medicine|dc:25|name:Diagnose Paralysis|traits:arcane,curse,necromancy|overrideTraits:true]检定能揭示出该受害者还活着。

+1 Status to All Saves vs. Vitality.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Vitality

Vordakai.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. vitality

Weakened Floor.name: Weakened Floor
Weakened Floor.disable: @Check[type:survival|dc:20] to knock loose the unstable floor and reveal a traversable ledge to the south.
Weakened Floor.hazarddescription: A section of the cave floor collapses under a creature, plunging it 40 feet into a chasm filled with jagged stalactites.

Floor Collapse.name: Floor Collapse
Floor Collapse.description:
Trigger A Small or larger creature enters the marked portion of the map

Effect The triggering creature falls, taking @Damage[20[bludgeoning]]{20} damage from the fall plus @Damage[3d6[piercing]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true]) from the stalagmites. A creature can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.3yoajuKjwHZ9ApUY]{Grab an Edge} to avoid falling, or succeed at a @Check[type:athletics|dc:20] check to climb out of the chasm.

Werendegar.name: Werendegar

Hungersense (Imprecise) 30 feet.name: Hungersense (Imprecise) 30 feet
Hungersense (Imprecise) 30 feet.description: Hungersense allows the gimmerling to sense creatures that require food to live.

Thorny Aura.name: Thorny Aura
Thorny Aura.description: 15 feet. Thorny roots and barbed vines writhe and twist in the aura, creating difficult hazardous terrain that inflicts @Damage[4d6[piercing]] damage whenever a non-flying creature moves within the aura.

Trip Up.name: Trip Up
Trip Up.description:
Trigger A creature critically fails a melee attack to hit Werendegar or moves into a space within Werendegar's thorny aura.

Effect The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:44|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of its next turn.

Failure The target takes @Damage[3d10[bludgeoning]] damage and is off-guard until the start of its next turn.

Critical failure As failure, and the target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Change Shape.name: Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
Werendegar changes into his natural form or that of any humanoid. In humanoid form, he loses his thorny aura, and his equipment appears to be trinkets or toys. As a humanoid that lacks claws or fangs, he loses the matching Strike. If he loses his claw Strike, he gains a fist Strike that is identical except that it deals bludgeoning damage.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Disarm.name: Disarm
Disarm.description:
Requirement Werendegar's last action was a success with a Strike that has Disarm in its damage entry.

Effect Werendegar knocks a held or carried weapon to the ground in the target's space.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: Werendegar deals 4d6 extra precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

Trickster's Step.name: Trickster's Step
Trickster's Step.description: Werendegar ignores difficult terrain, hazardous terrain, and doesn't trigger traps with its movement.

Werendegar.publicNotes:
Gimmerlings are small, shapeshifting fey who stage ambushes to sate their endless hunger and childish greed. These cruelly curious fey obsess over finding and making unusual traps and sadistic weapons, and their favorite amusement is se eing these traps sprung or the weapons wielded. When on the Material Plane, they are frequently found in urban areas, particularly slums or other parts of town where they can either go unnoticed or be easily forgotten-and have plenty of victims to choose from.

A typical gimmerling disguises itself as an endangered child, doing so in hopes of drawing creatures close enough to rob. The gimmerling puts itself in apparent danger using a trap, construct, or bribed ally, or even a coerced monster like a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.BAD7npndaooB3Pz1]{Redcap}.

Because gimmerlings sometimes trade obscure smithing or trapping techniques in exchange for gifts that sate their curiosity, their greed, or their hunger, they have at times been worshipped as minor gods of the forge. Some disciplined gimmerlings work as honored artisans, elite guards, or spies for the demigods known as the Eldest who dwell in the depths of the First World.

Whimwyrm.name: 异想龙 Whimwyrm
Whimwyrm.publicNotes:
异想龙是一种难以捉摸的龙类，产自于那异想天开而又无比危险的第一世界。虽然它们的色彩和外观可能会引起人们的崇拜，但是这些人的情绪很快就会从一个极端转向另一个极端。许多人认为它们可爱迷人且相对较小的体型就意味着无害，但这种想法将会迅速而又可怖地终结于异想龙的尖牙和魔法。

异想龙细长而又光滑，从头到尾不超过7英尺，并且其在战斗中的速度相当令人不安。当异想龙攻击时，无论是用其嘴里的尖牙还是它长长的尾巴，它都会在一次攻击中发起一阵迅捷的冲咬或鞭击。虽然从风格上来看，这些攻击包含着多次的啃咬和鞭击，但其依然属于单一的一次打击。

Fog Vision.name: 云雾视野 Fog Vision
Fog Vision.description: 烟雾和水汽不会阻碍异想龙的视线；它忽略源自于烟雾和水汽的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

Insult Challenges.name: 侮辱的挑战 Insult Challenges
Insult Challenges.description: 当一只异想龙的侮辱导致了一场战斗，它投掷表演用于先攻。一名参与了此次侮辱的PC也能够投掷表演，并且如果他们侮辱了异想龙，同时表演检定还胜过了异想龙的意志DC39，那么它会因为愤怒而感到气急败坏，从而在战斗开始时@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

Attack of Opportunity.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

Meddling Tail.name: 扰乱之尾 Meddling Tail
Meddling Tail.description:
触发 异想龙使用乱鞭尾击打击伤害了一个生物；

效果 异想龙可以尝试@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{卸武 Disarm}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove}、或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trip}所伤害的生物。

Mind-Numbing Breath.name: 乱心吐息 Mind-Numbing Breath
Mind-Numbing Breath.description:
异想龙喷出一股@Template[type:cone|distance:40]的闪亮洋红色迷雾。因为脑海中被突然出现的虚假（通常是不愉快的）记忆所淹没，该区域内的生物必须尝试一次@Check[type:will|dc:38]检定，根据其豁免结果受到@Damage[10d12[mental]]伤害。异想龙在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用乱心吐息。

大成功 闪烁的烟尘勾勒出该生物的轮廓，在1轮中无效其任何已生效的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}效果，并且不受伤害。

成功 该生物受到一半伤害，并且其隐形效果被无效2轮。

失败 该生物受到完整伤害，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}1分钟，并且其隐形效果被无效1分钟。

大失败 该生物受到双倍伤害，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}1轮，目眩1分钟，并且其隐形效果被无效1分钟。

Wild Hunt Archer.name: 狂猎射手 Wild Hunt Archer
Wild Hunt Archer.publicNotes:
这些体态轻盈、雌雄同体又酷似人类的生物有着尖尖的耳朵和散发有绿光的眼睛，它们的头发时刻都在轻柔地飘动，就仿佛一直处于微风之中。它们是有条不紊的猎手，其射出的箭矢精准得匪夷所思。由于狂猎射手往往比它们的大多数同伴都走得慢，所以经常依靠狂猎骏骑来提供更高的机动性。它们不需要携带普通的箭矢，而是可以使用魔法箭筒来制造所需要的箭——这些箭筒对除了狂猎射手之外的任何人都不起作用。

尽管有些人认为狂猎仅仅只是传说而已，但那些狂猎骑手却是货真价实的存在。这些无以计数的精类组成了狂猎——“狂猎”一词即指代由这些生物所组成的家族，也指代这些精类为了追逐猎物聚集而成的群体。

取决于猎物和他们自己的想法，狂猎君王为每次狩猎定下条件。猎物越容易被捕获，君王就越有可能设置强制性的规则，以此来让狩猎变得更加有趣，例如禁止除了让他们的猎犬以外的任何人伤害猎物，或者限制他们的武装来给予目标生物休息和恢复的空暇。

虽然大多数任务都源自狂猎君王所收集的传言，但君王偶尔也会考虑那些勇敢而又博学到能够找寻到他们的人的建议。他们只接受他们认为有价值的任务，并且由于对物质的财富并不感兴趣，他们为其服务所要求的报酬也是天差地别。狂猎君王会因对其不利的交易而感受到严重的冒犯。那些试图欺骗君王的人通常都会成为这个愤怒精类的下一个目标。

Greensight.name: 苍翠视野 Greensight
Greensight.description: 狂猎射手忽略源自于树叶和其他枝叶所造成的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

Planar Acclimation.name: 位面适应 Planar Acclimation
Planar Acclimation.description: 狂猎将其所在的位面视为它的家乡位面。

Wild Hunt Link.name: 狂猎链接 Wild Hunt Link
Wild Hunt Link.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:500] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

一只狂猎射手赋予其他所有灵光内除狂猎射手以外的狂猎成员在将@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}生物作为目标进行远程打击的时候无需通过@Check[type:flat|dc:5]的能力。

Instinctive Cooperation.name: 合作本能 Instinctive Cooperation
Instinctive Cooperation.description: 狂猎在对抗其他狂猎生物盟友所创造的效果的豁免骰中自动获得大成功。

Wild Gaze.name: 狂野凝视 Wild Gaze
Wild Gaze.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

那些与狂猎的凝视相对的人将会直面射手可怖的力量，并且发现在面对这种传奇的遗赠时是如此地难以行动。当一个生物在灵光中结束其回合时，它必须成功通过一个@Check[type:will|dc:34]检定来避免变为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}（在大失败时为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2}）。狂猎能够以一个具有专注特征的单动作激活或者关闭此灵光。

Focus Gaze.name: 聚焦凝视 Focus Gaze
Focus Gaze.description: 狂猎将其凝视聚焦于一个它所能看见的30尺内的生物。目标必须立即尝试一次意志豁免对抗狂猎的狂野凝视。如果该生物在尝试此次豁免前已经因狂野凝视而缓慢，豁免失败将导致它被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}1轮。在尝试了这次豁免后，该生物暂时免疫狂猎的狂野凝视，直至该狂猎的下一个回合开始。

Infuse Arrow.name: 注魔之箭 Infuse Arrow
Infuse Arrow.description:
狂猎射手施放一个射程为接触的法术，然后使用它们的活木弓进行一次远程打击。如果它们使用此次打击命中了一个生物，该生物同时也会成为法术效果的目标。如果打击未命中，则该法术被浪费。

或者，狂猎射手可以@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放 Cast a Spell}一个影响一个区域的法术，然后使用它们的活木弓进行一次远程打击。如果它们使用此次打击命中了一个生物，该法术以该生物为中心起效，并且该生物在对抗该法术效果的所有豁免上承受-2环境罚值。如果打击未命中，则该法术被浪费。

Living Bow.name: 活木弓 Living Bow
Living Bow.description: 狂猎射手携带者一把表现出它们箭术风格的活木弓。这把武器在狂猎射手的手中使用时就如同一把+2高等强击冻寒复合长弓。但在其他生物手里，活木弓只是一把普通的非魔法复合长弓。狂猎射手可以在上一把活木弓丢失或被摧毁时通过进项一个具有专注特征的持续一分钟的行动来显现一把替换的活木弓。一把活木弓看起来是由木头制成的，不断地长出枝叶，转变成秋日的色彩，然后凋落；它的弓弦是一条纯能量的散发出绿光的线。狂猎射手在使用活木弓时会自动地从箭袋中生成所需要的箭矢。

Seeking Shots.name: 寻猎之箭 Seeking Shots
Seeking Shots.description: 狂猎射手的远程打击和需要远程攻击骰的法术忽略它们目标的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态。

Wild Hunt Horse.name: 狂猎骏骑 Wild Hunt Horse
Wild Hunt Horse.publicNotes:
这些骏马站在阵阵风中，它们如草一般的鬃毛和尾巴在风中威严地摆动着。当它们不参与狩猎时，狂猎骏骑喜欢在陆地和天空中构建复杂的赛道，为了不断变化的赌注而相互竞赛。

尽管有些人认为狂猎仅仅只是传说而已，但那些狂猎骑手却是货真价实的存在。这些无以计数的精类组成了狂猎——“狂猎”一词即指代由这些生物所组成的家族，也指代这些精类为了追逐猎物聚集而成的群体。

取决于猎物和他们自己的想法，狂猎君王为每次狩猎定下条件。猎物越容易被捕获，君王就越有可能设置强制性的规则，以此来让狩猎变得更加有趣，例如禁止除了让他们的猎犬以外的任何人伤害猎物，或者限制他们的武装来给予目标生物休息和恢复的空暇。

虽然大多数任务都源自狂猎君王所收集的传言，但君王偶尔也会考虑那些勇敢而又博学到能够找寻到他们的人的建议。他们只接受他们认为有价值的任务，并且由于对物质的财富并不感兴趣，他们为其服务所要求的报酬也是天差地别。狂猎君王会因对其不利的交易而感受到严重的冒犯。那些试图欺骗君王的人通常都会成为这个愤怒精类的下一个目标。

Greensight.name: 苍翠视野 Greensight
Greensight.description: 狂猎忽略源自于树叶和其他枝叶所造成的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

Planar Acclimation.name: 位面适应 Planar Acclimation
Planar Acclimation.description: 狂猎将其所在的位面视为它的家乡位面。

Wild Hunt Link.name: 狂猎链接 Wild Hunt Link
Wild Hunt Link.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:500] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

一匹狂猎骏骑赋予其他所有灵光内除狂猎骏骑以外的狂猎成员的速度+10尺状态加值。

Instinctive Cooperation.name: 合作本能 Instinctive Cooperation
Instinctive Cooperation.description: 狂猎在对抗其他狂猎生物盟友所创造的效果的豁免骰中自动获得大成功。

Rider Synergy.name: 协同骑手 Rider Synergy
Rider Synergy.description: 如果狂猎骏骑有一个狂猎骑手，由打击对骏骑或骑手造成的伤害由两者平分。

Wild Gaze.name: 狂野凝视 Wild Gaze
Wild Gaze.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

那些与狂猎的凝视相对的人将会直面射手可怖的力量，并且发现在面对这种传奇的遗赠时是如此地难以行动。当一个生物在灵光中结束其回合时，它必须成功通过一个@Check[type:will|dc:33]检定来避免变为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}（在大失败时为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2}）。狂猎能够以一个具有专注特征的单动作激活或者关闭此灵光。

Bewildering Hoofbeats.name: 扰心蹄声 Bewildering Hoofbeats
Bewildering Hoofbeats.description:
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}60尺

狂猎骏骑跺着蹄子，在原地腾跃，发出数百匹骏骑从四面八方靠近的声音。@Template[type:emanation|distance:60]内的每个生物都必须尝试一次@Check[type:will|dc:33]豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响，并且暂时免疫扰心蹄声1小时。

成功 该生物被声音分散了注意力。在该生物下一回合开始前，如果它尝试使用反应动作，则必须成功通过一次@Check[type:flat|dc:5]检定，否则反应动作被打断，其动作被浪费且不造成效果。

失败 该生物被声音所迷惑，与成功效果相同，外加它还会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}1轮。

大失败 如同失败，但是困惑效果持续1分钟或者该生物通过其他的方式恢复。

Deafening Cry.name: 震耳嘶号 Deafening Cry
Deafening Cry.description: 狂猎骏骑在@Template[type:cone|distance:15]范围内发出雷霆般的嘶号。在该区域内的生物受到@Damage[16d6[sonic]]伤害（@Check[type:fortitude|dc:36|basic:true]豁免，外加在大失败时@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}1分钟）。狂猎骏骑在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用震耳嘶号。

Focus Gaze.name: 聚焦凝视 Focus Gaze
Focus Gaze.description: 狂猎将其凝视聚焦于一个它所能看见的30尺内的生物。目标必须立即尝试一次意志豁免对抗狂猎的狂野凝视。如果该生物在尝试此次豁免前已经因狂野凝视而缓慢，豁免失败将导致它被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}1轮。在尝试了这次豁免后，该生物暂时免疫狂猎的狂野凝视，直至该狂猎的下一个回合开始。

Wild Hunt Hound.name: 狂猎猎犬 Wild Hunt Hound
Wild Hunt Hound.publicNotes:
狂猎猎犬是聪慧的猎手和专业的追踪者，率先对抗难以发现的猎物。它们各行其是，追寻那些出了名的难以追踪的生物。它们总是包裹着由其受害者的灵魂碎片所组成的绿色雾气，这种神秘的雾霭将其化为幽灵兽群，一同它的身旁战斗。

尽管有些人认为狂猎仅仅只是传说而已，但那些狂猎骑手却是货真价实的存在。这些无以计数的精类组成了狂猎——“狂猎”一词即指代由这些生物所组成的家族，也指代这些精类为了追逐猎物聚集而成的群体。

取决于猎物和他们自己的想法，狂猎君王为每次狩猎定下条件。猎物越容易被捕获，君王就越有可能设置强制性的规则，以此来让狩猎变得更加有趣，例如禁止除了让他们的猎犬以外的任何人伤害猎物，或者限制他们的武装来给予目标生物休息和恢复的空暇。

虽然大多数任务都源自狂猎君王所收集的传言，但君王偶尔也会考虑那些勇敢而又博学到能够找寻到他们的人的建议。他们只接受他们认为有价值的任务，并且由于对物质的财富并不感兴趣，他们为其服务所要求的报酬也是天差地别。狂猎君王会因对其不利的交易而感受到严重的冒犯。那些试图欺骗君王的人通常都会成为这个愤怒精类的下一个目标。

Greensight.name: 苍翠视野 Greensight
Greensight.description: 狂猎猎犬忽略源自于树叶和其他枝叶所造成的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

Planar Acclimation.name: 位面适应 Planar Acclimation
Planar Acclimation.description: 狂猎将其所在的位面视为它的家乡位面。

Wild Hunt Link.name: 狂猎链接 Wild Hunt Link
Wild Hunt Link.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:500] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

一只狂猎猎犬将它持续性@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{识破隐性 See Invisibility}内在法术的效果赋予其他所有灵光内除狂猎猎犬以外的狂猎成员。

Instinctive Cooperation.name: 合作本能 Instinctive Cooperation
Instinctive Cooperation.description: 狂猎在对抗其他狂猎生物盟友所创造的效果的豁免骰中自动获得大成功。

Wild Gaze.name: 狂野凝视 Wild Gaze
Wild Gaze.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

那些与狂猎的凝视相对的人将会直面射手可怖的力量，并且发现在面对这种传奇的遗赠时是如此地难以行动。当一个生物在灵光中结束其回合时，它必须成功通过一个@Check[type:will|dc:31]检定来避免变为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}（在大失败时为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2}）。狂猎能够以一个具有专注特征的单动作激活或者关闭此灵光。

Focus Gaze.name: 聚焦凝视 Focus Gaze
Focus Gaze.description: 狂猎将其凝视聚焦于一个它所能看见的30尺内的生物。目标必须立即尝试一次意志豁免对抗狂猎的狂野凝视。如果该生物在尝试此次豁免前已经因狂野凝视而缓慢，豁免失败将导致它被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}1轮。在尝试了这次豁免后，该生物暂时免疫狂猎的狂野凝视，直至该狂猎的下一个回合开始。

Summon Pack.name: 召唤兽群 Summon Pack
Summon Pack.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 随着一声嚎叫，狂猎猎犬召唤出一团雾霭，显现为几只雾状的猎犬。只要狂猎猎犬维持这一效果，这些雾状的猎犬就会在@Template[type:emanation|distance:20] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}范围内移动、奔跑、嚎叫。虽然这些猎犬看起来是由雾霭形成的，但它们的利齿却是非常的真实，任何在此灵光范围内结束其回合的生物将会因数不胜数的啃咬而受到@Damage[6d6[piercing]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:31|basic:true]豁免）。

Wild Hunt Monarch.name: 狂猎君王 Wild Hunt Monarch
Wild Hunt Monarch.publicNotes:
每一个狂猎都追随者一名狂猎君王，他在精类和主物质位面之间旅行，寻找新的猎物。这些灵巧而高贵的酷似人形的生物长着麋鹿角、又尖又长的耳朵、一头飘逸的白发、以及散发着冷光的绿色眼睛。

尽管有些人认为狂猎仅仅只是传说而已，但那些狂猎骑手却是货真价实的存在。这些无以计数的精类组成了狂猎——“狂猎”一词即指代由这些生物所组成的家族，也指代这些精类为了追逐猎物聚集而成的群体。

取决于猎物和他们自己的想法，狂猎君王为每次狩猎定下条件。猎物越容易被捕获，君王就越有可能设置强制性的规则，以此来让狩猎变得更加有趣，例如禁止除了让他们的猎犬以外的任何人伤害猎物，或者限制他们的武装来给予目标生物休息和恢复的空暇。

虽然大多数任务都源自狂猎君王所收集的传言，但君王偶尔也会考虑那些勇敢而又博学到能够找寻到他们的人的建议。他们只接受他们认为有价值的任务，并且由于对物质的财富并不感兴趣，他们为其服务所要求的报酬也是天差地别。狂猎君王会因对其不利的交易而感受到严重的冒犯。那些试图欺骗君王的人通常都会成为这个愤怒精类的下一个目标。

Greensight.name: 苍翠视野 Greensight
Greensight.description: 狂猎忽略源自于树叶和其他枝叶所造成的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

Planar Acclimation.name: 位面适应 Planar Acclimation
Planar Acclimation.description: 狂猎将其所在的位面视为它的家乡位面。

Wild Hunt Link.name: 狂猎链接 Wild Hunt Link
Wild Hunt Link.description:
1英里@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

狂猎君主增加了链接范围来影响到一英里内所有的狂猎成员。处于链接中的其他狂猎生物在狂猎君王60尺范围内结束其回合时会获得再生50直至其下个回合结束；这种再生只能通过迫使狂猎离开60尺灵光范围或者杀死狂猎君王来使其无效。

Instinctive Cooperation.name: 合作本能 Instinctive Cooperation
Instinctive Cooperation.description: 狂猎在对抗其他狂猎生物盟友所创造的效果的豁免骰中自动获得大成功。

Wild Gaze.name: 狂野凝视 Wild Gaze
Wild Gaze.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

那些与狂猎的凝视相对的人将会直面射手可怖的力量，并且发现在面对这种传奇的遗赠时是如此地难以行动。当一个生物在灵光中结束其回合时，它必须成功通过一个@Check[type:will|dc:39]检定来避免变为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}（在大失败时为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2}）。狂猎能够以一个具有专注特征的单动作激活或者关闭此灵光。

Brutal Gore.name: 残酷顶刺 Brutal Gore
Brutal Gore.description: 一个被君王角抵打击重击命中的生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

Call Glaive.name: 召唤君王之刃 Call Glaive
Call Glaive.description: 狂猎君王持用着一种被称为君王之刃的魔法武器。这把武器仅在君王手中如同一把+3上等强击高等雷鸣血光大砍刀那样运作。君王可以使用这一动作来将它们的大砍刀召唤到手里，其能够传送过任何距离。如果它们的大砍刀被摧毁，君王可以使用三动作行动的召唤君王之刃来创造一把新的，这一行动具有操作特征。

Call to the Hunt.name: 狩猎呼唤 Call to the Hunt
Call to the Hunt.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 狂猎君王吹响了他们的君王号角，将不超过君王所在位置1英里内处于君王狂猎链接中的两名狂猎斥候或者四名狂猎射手传送至君王所选择的30尺内的任意位置。它们紧接着在狂猎君王下一轮的先攻开始前行动。

Focus Gaze.name: 聚焦凝视 Focus Gaze
Focus Gaze.description: 狂猎将其凝视聚焦于一个它所能看见的30尺内的生物。目标必须立即尝试一次意志豁免对抗狂猎的狂野凝视。如果该生物在尝试此次豁免前已经因狂野凝视而缓慢，豁免失败将导致它被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}1轮。在尝试了这次豁免后，该生物暂时免疫狂猎的狂野凝视，直至该狂猎的下一个回合开始。

Wild Reincarnation.name: 狂猎转生 Wild Reincarnation
Wild Reincarnation.description:
触发 狂猎君王杀死了一个邻接的非精类生物；

效果 狂猎君王试图将该生物转生为一个精类。被杀死的生物必须尝试一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:42]检定，并且如果在死亡时处于任何由君王所施加的惑控系效果下的话，在这一豁免中承受-2状态罚值。

大成功 该生物改为如同受到@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IkGYwHRLhkuoGReG]{死者复活 Raise Dead}（升阶至10环）那样被复活，并且永久免疫那个狂猎君王的狂猎转生。

成功 该生物仍是死亡的，并未被转生。

失败 该生物暂时被转生为了一个君王所选择的精类生物。新的精类等级必须等于或低于死亡生物的等级，并且在其他所有方面都与该精类相同；它没有保留任何转生生物的能力，并且只有零星的记忆或个性，它遵从该狂猎君王的指挥和命令。在1分钟后，转生的精类死亡，它的身体复原成原本的尸体，然后可以被如常复活。

大失败 如同失败，但是转生的精类在被杀害前都一直活着；、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{祈愿术 Wish}或类似的强大法术或效果也可以逆转这种转生。

Wild Hunt Scout.name: 狂猎斥候 Wild Hunt Scout
Wild Hunt Scout.publicNotes:
这些矮小健壮的少数派长着尖耳朵、绿色眼睛和公羊角。它们享受着寻找机会来报复那些冤枉或者侮辱了狂猎的人，但是当风险并不致命的时候，它们往往会变得兴致全无。

尽管有些人认为狂猎仅仅只是传说而已，但那些狂猎骑手却是货真价实的存在。这些无以计数的精类组成了狂猎——“狂猎”一词即指代由这些生物所组成的家族，也指代这些精类为了追逐猎物聚集而成的群体。

取决于猎物和他们自己的想法，狂猎君王为每次狩猎定下条件。猎物越容易被捕获，君王就越有可能设置强制性的规则，以此来让狩猎变得更加有趣，例如禁止除了让他们的猎犬以外的任何人伤害猎物，或者限制他们的武装来给予目标生物休息和恢复的空暇。

虽然大多数任务都源自狂猎君王所收集的传言，但君王偶尔也会考虑那些勇敢而又博学到能够找寻到他们的人的建议。他们只接受他们认为有价值的任务，并且由于对物质的财富并不感兴趣，他们为其服务所要求的报酬也是天差地别。狂猎君王会因对其不利的交易而感受到严重的冒犯。那些试图欺骗君王的人通常都会成为这个愤怒精类的下一个目标。

Greensight.name: 苍翠视野 Greensight
Greensight.description: 狂猎忽略源自于树叶和其他枝叶所造成的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

Planar Acclimation.name: 位面适应 Planar Acclimation
Planar Acclimation.description: 狂猎将其所在的位面视为它的家乡位面。

Wild Hunt Link.name: 狂猎链接 Wild Hunt Link
Wild Hunt Link.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:500] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

一个狂猎斥候赋予其他所有灵光内除它以外的狂猎成员@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.PNpmVmD21zViDtGC]{否决优势 Deny Advantage}能力。

Instinctive Cooperation.name: 合作本能 Instinctive Cooperation
Instinctive Cooperation.description: 狂猎在对抗其他狂猎生物盟友所创造的效果的豁免骰中自动获得大成功。

Wild Gaze.name: 狂野凝视 Wild Gaze
Wild Gaze.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

那些与狂猎的凝视相对的人将会直面射手可怖的力量，并且发现在面对这种传奇的遗赠时是如此地难以行动。当一个生物在灵光中结束其回合时，它必须成功通过一个@Check[type:will|dc:37]检定来避免变为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}（在大失败时为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2}）。狂猎能够以一个具有专注特征的单动作激活或者关闭此灵光。

Befuddle.name: 昏沉 Befuddle
Befuddle.description: 狂猎斥候可以从它们的晶能碎片中发射出一束绿宝石的光芒来尝试一次绿宝石波束远程打击。如果波束命中，它不会造成伤害（也不会因为偷袭而造成精准伤害），但它会过载目标的思维，导致他们在一轮内@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}。在重击时，目标还会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}1轮。

Deny Advantage.name: 否决优势 Deny Advantage
Deny Advantage.description: 狂猎斥候不因同级或更低等级生物的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected}或夹击而@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}，也不会因同级或更低等级生物的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.w6rMqmGzhUahdnA7]{突袭 Surprise Attack}而措手不及。然而，这些生物依旧可以帮助它们的盟友制造夹击。

Focus Gaze.name: 聚焦凝视 Focus Gaze
Focus Gaze.description: 狂猎将其凝视聚焦于一个它所能看见的30尺内的生物。目标必须立即尝试一次意志豁免对抗狂猎的狂野凝视。如果该生物在尝试此次豁免前已经因狂野凝视而缓慢，豁免失败将导致它被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}1轮。在尝试了这次豁免后，该生物暂时免疫狂猎的狂野凝视，直至该狂猎的下一个回合开始。

Forceful Focus.name: 聚能力场 Forceful Focus
Forceful Focus.description:
需求 狂猎斥候在上一轮中施放了魔法飞弹。

效果 狂猎斥候专心于它们对力场的掌握，屹立在地，全身包裹着脉动的绿宝石光芒。它们在当天所施放的所有魔法飞弹内在法术都将被恢复，允许被再次施放。在它们的下一轮结束前，任何受到狂猎斥候力场伤害的生物必须成功通过一个@Check[type:fortitude|dc:40]检定，否则@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}（在大失败时@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 3}）。狂猎斥候无法在1小时内再次使用聚能力场。

Manifest Crystals.name: 显现水晶 Manifest Crystals
Manifest Crystals.description: 狂猎斥候可以在手中显现一把由力场结晶制成的+2高等强击弯刀，或是同种类的拳头大小的碎片。这些物品在狂猎斥候死亡或是不再持有它们时消失。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
狂猎斥候对措手不及的生物造成3d6额外精准伤害。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Windchaser.name: Windchaser

Gallop.name: Gallop
Gallop.description: Windchaser Strides twice. It has a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed during these Strides.

Windchaser.publicNotes: Horses serve as mounts and beasts of burden in many societies. They are loyal and typically gentle creatures, and they are invaluable to those looking to travel long distances. Smaller folk, like gnomes and halflings, often utilize ponies as mounts, while horses are the favored steeds for humans and other Medium humanoids. Most horses that the average humanoid encounters are domesticated, though large herds of these powerful animals can be found in the wild.

Winged Owlbear.name: Winged Owlbear

Bloodcurdling Screech.name: Bloodcurdling Screech
Bloodcurdling Screech.description:
The owlbear unleashes a loud screech that terrifies its prey. Each creature in an @Template[type:emanation|distance:80] must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:40] save. Regardless of the result, creatures are temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}.

Gnaw.name: Gnaw
Gnaw.description:
Requirements The owlbear has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} with its talons.

Effect The owlbear attempts to disembowel the creature with a beak Strike. If the Strike hits, the target must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:40] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Failure The target is sickened 1 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} as long as it remains sickened.

Screeching Advance.name: Screeching Advance
Screeching Advance.description: The owlbear makes a Bloodcurdling Screech and Strides twice. All creatures within @Template[type:emanation|distance:80]{80 feet} of the owlbear at any point during this movement are subjected to the effects of Bloodcurdling Screech.

Winged Owlbear.publicNotes:
With the body of a powerful brown bear and the keen senses of an owl, the owlbear is a dangerous territorial predator, fearlessly attacking any creature that strays into its domain. Those who run afoul of an owlbear hear its terrifying screech only seconds before the massive creature is upon them, ripping them apart with deadly talons and a powerful beak.

Although their origin is lost to time, owlbears are assumed to be the result of a magical experiment to make a more cunning predator. According to the legend, the wizard was too successful and ended up being the flrst victim of the beast. Today, owlbears can be found around the world, with a variety of features. While the most common subspecies looks like a brown bear with the features of a great horned owl, owlbears from the frozen north might resemble polar bears mixed with snowy owls, and in temperate rain forests they might resemble black bears with the heads of barn owls.

Most owlbears live solitary lives, gathering only to mate and raise cubs, which are hatched from eggs. An owlbear's territory usually extends to around 5 miles from its lair, with clear signs of its habitat appearing with 1 mile (clawed up trees, gigantic feathers, and shredded carcasses). The lair of an owlbear rarely holds anything of value, but some adventurers have found trinkets, coins, and even jewelry in the massive pellets of undigested bones these monsters leave behind.

Site Bound.name: Site Bound
Site Bound.description: A typical ghost can stray only a short distance from where it was killed or the place it haunts. A typical limit is 120 feet. Some ghosts are instead bound to a room, building, item, or creature that was special to it rather than a location.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: When a ghost is destroyed, it re-forms after [[/br 2d4 #days]]{2d4 days} within the location it's bound to, fully healed. A ghost can be permanently destroyed only if someone determines the reason for its existence and sets right whatever prevents the spirit from resting.

Shyka's Judgement.name: Shyka's Judgement
Shyka's Judgement.description:
Xae clasps her hands together and cries out in Sylvan for Shyka to judge those who dare intrude upon the shrine-"Aid me, Shyka, so that your shrine will remain undefiled!" The seven statues around the perimeter of the room suddenly animate and hurl spectral versions of their hourglass-headed maces into the room, filling area A3 with a whirling vortex of pale blue-and-white energy. All living creatures in area A3 must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:30] save. Xae cannot call upon Shyka's Judgment for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes @Damage[6d6[mental]] damage.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[12d6[mental]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} as their mind struggles with memories that seem to be from past lives that weigh the character's current actions in judgment.

Critical Failure The creature takes @Damage[18d6[mental]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} by their mental struggle with their judgmental past lives. The creature also takes @Damage[2d6[persistent,mental]] damage that ends if they leave area A3.

Twist Time.name: Twist Time
Twist Time.description:
Xae attempts a ghostly hand strike. If she hits, she inflicts damage as normal, but the target struck must also attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30] save (the target takes a -2 penalty to this saving throw if the strike was a critical hit).

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round as the rest of reality seems to speed up.

Failure The creature becomes decrepit from unnatural aging. It is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2}, and as long as it has the slowed condition, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} as well.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature feels death knocking on the door-it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} as long as it remains slowed by Twist Time.

Zorek.name: Zorek

Blessed Life.name: Blessed Life
Blessed Life.description: Zorek does not age or breathe, and he doesn't need to eat, drink, or sleep.

Divine Recovery.name: Divine Recovery
Divine Recovery.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger Zorek fails a saving throw

Effect Zorek loses all negative conditions he is currently affected by and may attempt a new saving throw against the effect that triggered Divine Recovery. His armor and weapons glow with blood-red light when he uses this ability.

Zorek.blurb: Ageless male human cleric of Gorum

First World Army.name: 第一世界军队 First World Army

Numerian Radiant Warden.name: 钮梅利亚辐光守卫 Numerian Radiant Warden

Gatekeeper Aura.name: 守门灵光 Gatekeeper Aura
Gatekeeper Aura.description: 60尺。如果1个生物在灵光范围内使用传送（teleportation）能力，或通过传送能力进入灵光范围内，则必须通过@Check[type:will|dc:38]检定，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}，并且他的目的地会被辐光守卫更改为灵光弥散范围内的任意地点。一旦豁免成功，目标能正常抵达目的地，但依旧陷入恶心1。

Numerian Construct.name: 钮梅利亚构装体 Numerian Construct
Numerian Construct.description:
在钮梅利亚，与精金魔像、巨神兵或辐光守卫发生的任何遭遇均为这些生物的远古机械版本。在遭遇到这些怪物时，要把它们描述得更加具有科技风格。巨神兵的腐蚀灵光描述为分解型纳米机器人云团，其湮灭光线则表现为等离子爆破。精金魔像可能会有坦克一样的履带而非双足步行，它的喷气能力则可以表现为向着锥形区域放射的几十束激光。辐光守卫的辐光射线及爆发则可以是聚焦的引力光线引发的震荡涟漪。

所有这些构装体都具有15点重击和电击弱点，但其他数据不会改变。若你不想把钮梅利亚的超科技以及怪奇技术引入到战役中来，则可以用标准版本的构装体来呈现上述内容，或者干脆为了更加贴合你的战役内容而重掷随机遭遇。

Orrery.name: 星象仪 Orrery
Orrery.description: 直到它行动之前，辐光守卫能让自己看起来像一座星象仪（或类似的大型机械装置，例如天文望远镜）。在伪装成此类装置的情况下，它的欺骗检定结果和DC自动取53。

Radiant Blast.name: 辐光爆发 Radiant Blast
Radiant Blast.description: 辐光守卫对@Template[type:cone|distance:50]范围释放一道耀眼的能量波，造成@Damage[10d12[force]]伤害（@Check[type:reflex|dc:38|basic:true]豁免）。辐光守卫在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Radiant Blast]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用辐光爆发。

Radiant Blow.name: 辐光闪耀 Radiant Blow
Radiant Blow.description: 如果1个生物被辐光守卫的锤击打击命中，一股辐光能量会试图将该生物锚定在原地。生物必须尝试1次@Check[type:will|dc:38]检定；如果失败，目标在1分钟之内无法使用具有传送特征的效果；如果大失败，目标还会陷入永久@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]。

Numerian Radiant Warden.publicNotes:
神秘而奇异的辐光守卫是数千年前建造的，用来保护天文台和学者们免受被称为黑色支配者（Dominion of the Black）的外星人入侵。随着时间的推移，它们的守护职责已经开展到更大的领域，包括监视任何时间和空间法则遭到削弱的区域，特别是那些连接星球、位面、空间之间的传送门和永久性通道附近的地区。

它们得名于组成他们身体的同心圆环所具有的辐光特性，以及在攻击时迸发出的炫彩光辉。辐光守卫肩负着它们的职责，一心一意地保卫着基地不受入侵。

Smoke-Filled Room.name: Smoke-Filled Room
Smoke-Filled Room.disable: While a spell like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.g8QqHpv2CWDwmIm1]{Gust of Wind} can temporarily clear a path through the smoke, the hazard returns at the start of the next round as long as the fires in area A17 continue to burn; @Check[type:survival|dc:18] to know how best to cover your nose and mouth with a wet cloth to help alleviate the choking effects of the smoke.
Smoke-Filled Room.hazarddescription: Thick smoke fills this room, making it difficult to see and breathe.
Smoke-Filled Room.reset: The smoke continues to affect anyone who enters area A16 until the fires in area A17 are extinguished.

Choke.name: Choke
Choke.description:
Trigger A creature that isn't holding their breath walks into the hallway or starts their turn in the hallway

Effect The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected by the smoke.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} by the smoke.

Failure The creature is sickened 1 and takes @Damage[1d6[nonlethal]] damage from choking on the smoke. A creature that falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} from the nonlethal damage begins to suffocate in [[/r {1d4+1} #rounds]]{1d4+1 rounds} if not dragged to safety.

Critical Failure As failure, but @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} and @Damage[1d6[persistent,nonlethal]] damage.

Burning Room.name: Burning Room
Burning Room.description:
The flames and heat deal @Damage[1d6[fire]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:16|basic:true] save) to creatures who end their turns in these burning chambers as long as the fires continue.

Breaking the room's glass window before the fire is extinguished causes the fire within to flare up and deal @Damage[2d6[fire]] damage at the end of that round (rather than the standard 1d6), but once at least three of the burning rooms have their windows ventilated, the smoke in these rooms and in area A16 lessens, and the DC of the Fortitude save to resist its Choke effect is reduced to 11.

Site Bound.name: Site Bound
Site Bound.description: A typical ghost can stray only a short distance from where it was killed or the place it haunts. A typical limit is 120 feet. Some ghosts are instead bound to a room, building, item, or creature that was special to it rather than a location.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description:
Releasing the nereid and allowing her to leave this place (or, alternatively, killing her) allows the Gardener to move on to the afterlife.

When a ghost is destroyed, it re-forms after [[/br 2d4 #days]]{2d4 days} within the location it's bound to, fully healed. A ghost can be permanently destroyed only if someone determines the reason for its existence and sets right whatever prevents the spirit from resting.

Corrupting Gaze.name: Corrupting Gaze
Corrupting Gaze.description:
The ghost stares at a creature it can see within 30 feet. The target takes @Damage[9d6[void]] damage with a @Check[type:will|dc:37|basic:true] save.

A creature that fails its save is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 minute.

Draining Touch.name: Draining Touch
Draining Touch.description:
With a touch, the ghost attempts to drain a living creature's life force. It makes a ghostly hand Strike but deals no damage on a hit.

Instead, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} for 1 day, and the ghost regains [[/r (max(1,floor(@actor.level/2)))[healing]]]{HP equal to half its own level}.

Quickened Casting.name: Quickened Casting
Quickened Casting.description:
Frequency once per day.

If the Gardener's next action is to cast a 6th- or lower level spell, reduce the number of actions to cast it by 1 (minimum 1 action).

Telekinetic Assault.name: Telekinetic Assault
Telekinetic Assault.description: The ghost cries out in pain and anguish as small objects and debris fly about in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. Creatures in this area take @Damage[9d6[bludgeoning]] damage, subject to a @Check[type:reflex|dc:37|basic:true] save.

Numerian Adamantine Golem.name: Numerian Adamantine Golem

Golem Antimagic.name: Golem Antimagic
Golem Antimagic.description:
harmed by acid ([[/r {9d10}]]{9d10 damage}, [[/r {2d10}]]{2d10 damage} from areas or persistent damage); healed by fire (area [[/r 2d10[healing]]] Hit Points); slowed by electricity

A golem is immune to spells and magical abilities other than its own, but each type of golem is affected by a few types of magic in special ways. These exceptions are listed in shortened form in the golem's stat block, with the full rules appearing here. If an entry lists multiple types (such as "cold and water"), either type of spell can affect the golem.

  • Harmed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to take the listed amount of damage (this damage has no type) instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of magic of this type or is affected by a persistent effect of the appropriate type, it takes the damage listed in the parenthetical.
  • Healed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem makes the golem lose the slowed condition and gain HP equal to half the damage the spell would have dealt. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it gains the HP listed in the parenthetical.
  • Slowed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for [[/br 2d6 #rounds]]{2d6 rounds} instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it's slowed 1 for that round.
  • Vulnerable To Each golem is vulnerable to one or more specific spells, with the effects described in its stat block.

Numerian Construct.name: Numerian Construct
Numerian Construct.description:
Any encounters with adamantine golems, guthallaths, or radiant wardens in Numeria are with ancient robotic versions of these creatures. In encounters with them, describe them as having more technological aspects. The guthallath's erosion aura could be caused by clouds of deconstructor nanites and its annihilation beams manifest as plasma blasts. The adamantine golem might have tank treads instead of legs and its vent ability might manifest as a spray of dozens of laser beams in a cone. And the radiant warden's radiant beams and blast serve as rippling attacks of focused graviton beams.

All of these constructs have weakness 15 to critical hits and electricity, but their other statistics do not change. If you'd rather not introduce Numeria's themes of super-science and strange technology, you can either present these constructs as standard versions, or re-roll your encounter to get a more appropriate result for your game.

Repair Mode.name: Repair Mode
Repair Mode.description:
When the adamantine golem is at 0 HP, it isn't destroyed. Instead, it enters repair mode, during which it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}, can't take reactions, and can take only the Self-Repair action.

Once it has more than 30 HP, it can use any type of action and can use reactions, though it remains slowed 1 and can't take any reactions until the start of its next turn.

If a critical hit with an adamantine @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.6xaxxKfvXED6LfIY]{Vorpal} weapon reduces the golem to 0 HP, or if such a weapon hits it while it's already at 0 HP, then the golem is destroyed.

Vulnerable to Dispelling.name: Vulnerable to Dispelling
Vulnerable to Dispelling.description:
The golem can be targeted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ihbRf964JDXztcy3]{Disjunction} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}.

If targeted by such a spell of 9th level or higher, the golem has its resistance to physical damage lowered to 15 and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} if in repair mode) for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. During this time, if the golem is reduced to 0 HP while already in repair mode, it is destroyed.

Destructive Strike.name: Destructive Strike
Destructive Strike.description: On a critical hit, the adamantine golem's fist Strike breaks the target's armor, if any, in addition to dealing damage to the target. If the target has a shield raised, the golem breaks the shield instead.

Inexorable March.name: Inexorable March
Inexorable March.description:
@Check[type:fortitude|dc:45|traits:damaging-effect]

Critical Success The creature takes no damage and its armor takes no damage.

Success The golem halts its movement and cannot enter the creature's square.

Failure The resisting creature is damaged and its armor takes damage as if hit by the adamantine golem's fist.

The golem Strides up to its Speed, pushing back each creature whose space it moves into and damaging them if they try to stop its movement. A creature can attempt to bar the way by succeeding at a Fortitude save.

Self-Repair.name: Self-Repair
Self-Repair.description: The golem repairs itself, regaining [[/r 30[healing]]]{30 Hit Points}.

Vent.name: Vent
Vent.description:
The golem vents a @Template[type:cone|distance:30]{30-foot cone} of superheated steam from its internal forge. This deals @Damage[15d6[fire]] damage to all creatures in the cone (@Check[type:reflex|dc:40|basic:true]).

The golem can't use Vent again for [[/br 1d6 #Recharge Vent]]{1d6 rounds}.

Numerian Adamantine Golem.publicNotes:
Crafted from a nigh-indestructible metal of great rarity, adamantine golems can't be destroyed except by the most powerful foes. Crafting an adamantine golem requires a quantity of adamantine so massive that collecting it usually requires mounting a mining expedition to a distant planet, the Plane of Earth, or an Outer Plane.

Crafted of base materials and then magically animated into a powerful guardian, the legendary golem is a living construct that mindlessly obeys its creator's commands-often continuing to do so for years or even centuries after its creator's death. There exist two known methods of animating a golem. The traditional method involves harvesting and implanting an elemental soul or essence within the newly crafted host statue, a procedure seen as vile and blasphemous to those who value the sanctity of the soul; evil or amoral golem crafters tend to prefer this method. The other, less disreputable technique involves siphoning pure vitality energy into the statue to artificially imitate the creation of a soul. The result does not give the golem a true soul and is generally a more costly and time-consuming method of creation. Regardless of the method used, the resulting golem functions the same. A golem's unique animating force leaves it susceptible to certain forms of magic, but apart from these few weaknesses, it is impervious to magic and difficult to damage with weapons.

Golems work best in play as foes to vanquish rather than allies to accompany player characters on adventures. The process of creating a golem is time-consuming, expensive, and difficult, and only the most talented spellcasters or artisans can even hope to accomplish such an undertaking. While certain magical texts-so-called "golem manuals"-are said to aid golems crafters, for the most part the creation of a golem should be something left in the hands of the Game Master.

Golems have components that can be harvested as trophies or magical components; the value depends on the golem in question. Examples of components that can be harvested from golems are listed in the sidebars.

Breeg's Traps.name: Breeg's Traps
Breeg's Traps.reset: There are enough traps in this hex that this hazard can be triggered up to 5 times before all the traps are used up.

Clamp Shut.name: Clamp Shut
Clamp Shut.description:
Trigger Anyone Travels or Reconnoiters this hex

Effect If the characters are Traveling, one of them (determined randomly) steps in a trap. If the characters are Reconnoitering, [[/br 1d4]] of them (determined randomly) step in a trap. When a creature steps in a trap, the trap makes a bear trap Strike against the creature.

Breeg's Traps.disable: @Check[type:survival|dc:17] (made as an individual hexploration activity) to locate and disarm all the traps by hand.
Breeg's Traps.hazarddescription:
Several dozen spike snares are littered across this hex.

Treasure: Each time a PC triggers a trap, the trap is destroyed. If all the traps are disabled, materials to craft six spike snares can be salvaged.

Numerian Guthallah.name: Numerian Guthallah

Erosion Aura.name: Erosion Aura
Erosion Aura.description: 120 feet. The guthallath erodes away the physical integrity of all around it. Creatures and objects in the emanation other than the guthallath have their hardness and resistances reduced by 10. At the start of its turn, a creature in the erosion aura's area takes @Damage[6d6[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:39|basic:true]).

Immunity to Magic.name: Immunity to Magic
Immunity to Magic.description: The guthallath is immune to spells of lower than 7th level and the activated effects of magic items of lower than 14th level.

Numerian Construct.name: Numerian Construct
Numerian Construct.description:
Any encounters with adamantine golems, guthallaths, or radiant wardens in Numeria are with ancient robotic versions of these creatures. In encounters with them, describe them as having more technological aspects. The guthallath's erosion aura could be caused by clouds of deconstructor nanites and its annihilation beams manifest as plasma blasts. The adamantine golem might have tank treads instead of legs and its vent ability might manifest as a spray of dozens of laser beams in a cone. And the radiant warden's radiant beams and blast serve as rippling attacks of focused graviton beams.

All of these constructs have weakness 15 to critical hits and electricity, but their other statistics do not change. If you'd rather not introduce Numeria's themes of super-science and strange technology, you can either present these constructs as standard versions, or re-roll your encounter to get a more appropriate result for your game.

Deadly Throw.name: Deadly Throw
Deadly Throw.description:
Requirements The guthallath has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.

Effect The guthallath throws the creature into the air, 100 feet high and 50 feet away. If the flung creature lands on another creature, the creature it lands on takes the same amount of bludgeoning damage. The creature being landed on can attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:41|basic:true] save.

Powerful Blows.name: Powerful Blows
Powerful Blows.description: If a guthallath hits with an attack and rolls a natural 19 on the d20 roll, the attack is a critical hit. This has no effect if the 19 would be a failure.

Annihilation Beams.name: Annihilation Beams
Annihilation Beams.description:
A guthallath releases two beams of destruction from its eyes. Each beam is a @Template[type:line|distance:120]. Everything in either line takes the effect of a hit from a 10th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r7ihOgKv19eJQnik]{Disintegrate} spell (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:41|basic:true|traits:attack,evocation,arcane]). There is no additional effect on creatures in any area where the beams overlap.

The guthallath can't use this ability again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Annihilation Beams]]{1d4 rounds}.

Numerian Guthallah.publicNotes:
A guthallath is an enormous construct created long ago by some unknown empire, probably as a war machine. Nearly 100 feet tall, this massive stone statue typically resembles a stalwart warrior wearing only a loincloth and skullcap. Few have seen the entire body of a guthallath, though; most of the time such a relic is buried up to its neck, covered in moss and stranded in some forgotten place. Yet, every so often, one of these harbingers of destruction reactivates in response to some unknown stimulus or rallying call, and when this happens, woe be unto any who stand in its way.

While the guthallath's ancient enemies are gone, it is an engine of pure destruction, designed to rampage for weeks or even months. While not intelligent enough to enjoy or regret its acts, the guthallath cannot be reasoned with-it is unaffected by most magic, and is unpredictable in how it selects its targets (and creatures it spares).

Raise a Shield.name: Raise a Shield
Raise a Shield.description:
Requirements You are wielding a shield

You position your shield to protect yourself. When you have Raised a Shield, you gain its listed circumstance bonus to AC. Your shield remains raised until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.2YgXoHvJfrDHucMr]{Effect: Raise a Shield}

Formation Fighters.name: Formation Fighters
Formation Fighters.description: Drelev guard gains a +2 circumstance bonus on attack and damage rolls as long as he is adjacent to at least two other Drelev guards.

Intimidating Strike.name: Intimidating Strike
Intimidating Strike.description: The Drelev guard makes a melee Strike. If he hits and deals damage, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} on a critical hit.

Enhanced Familiar.name: Enhanced Familiar
Enhanced Familiar.description: Imeckus Stroon's familiar Lintwerth is a loyal companion and is a bit more powerful than the standard familiar in that he does not possess the minion trait; Imeckus can direct Lintwerth's actions verbally as a free action. If Lintwerth is slain, Imeckus becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} for 24 hours.

Recall Lintwerth.name: Recall Lintwerth
Recall Lintwerth.description: Imeckus calls out Lintwerth's name and snaps his fingers, causing his dust mephit familiar (and up to 1 Bulk of objects carried by Lintwerth) to instantly transport to an adjacent square of Imeckus' choice, providing Lintwerth is within a mile.

Steady Spellcasting.name: Steady Spellcasting
Steady Spellcasting.description: If a reaction would disrupt Imeckus's spellcasting action, he attempts a @Check[type:flat|dc:15]; if he succeeds, his action isn't disrupted.

Drain Lintwerth.name: Drain Lintwerth
Drain Lintwerth.description:
Frequency once per day;

Requirements Imeckus hasn't yet acted on his turn and Lintwerth is in an adjacent square

Effect Imeckus draws power from his bond with his familiar. During his turn, he gains the ability to cast one spell he prepared today and already cast, without spending a spell slot. He must still Cast the Spell and meet the spell's other requirements.

Quickened Casting.name: Quickened Casting
Quickened Casting.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect If Imeckus's next action is to cast a cantrip or spell that is 4th level or lower, reduce the number of actions to cast it by 1 (minimum 1 action).
